Posts.Content: Hi breast friends, I have been on letrosole for 2 1/2 years and so far no hair thinking. I have bone thinning though. 17% loss since once my last dexa scan. They want to put me on meds which I have declined, can't put up with more side effects .
Posts.Title: letrozole hair thinning

Posts.Content: Hi Mirabo I have managed to get my prescription for Sandoz but having big problems finding it. Do you?? I have managed to get 3months but no one can get it from their suppliers. Where are you based?? I . Must have contacted every pharmacy in my area!!
